name: Design and Collaboration? Making it work
description:
Designing with collaboration across all teams can be hectic


Should you follow the traditional communication approach of daily standups or asynchronous communication given rising remote practices? How to communicate better with developers as a designer?


This guide may help an expanding team or a new startup who just started exploring various methods and are setting a design process for their startup.


Take bits from here and there or use it whole. It would certainly streamline your design process.
